hymn.title: Why was a cup made?
hymn.chords: | C - G/B - | Am - C/G C/E | F - Dm - | G - G7 - | C - G/B - | Am - C/G C/E | F - Dm - | G - G7 - | C - - - | C7 - - - | F - - - | Fm - - - | C - G/B - | Am - C/G C/E | F - G7 - | C F/C C - |

layout.singingstanza: Why was a cup made? To have a drink in -- side it. Why was a shoe made? To have a foot in -- side it. Why was an en -- ve -- lope made? To have a let -- ter in -- side it. Why were you and I made? To have God's life in us.

lyrics.stanza: Why was a cup made? To have a drink inside it. Why was a shoe made? To have a foot inside it. Why was an envelope made? To have a letter inside it. Why were you and I made? To have God's life in us.

Why was a glove made? To have a hand inside it. Why was a purse made? To have some coins inside it. Why was a flower vase made? To have some flowers inside it. Why were you and I made? To have God's life in us.
